analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/36/0x8c0d9959d123c2f40f0dee18dbfa19a3c292c12a.sol:
	Contract EasySocial has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0x8c0d9959d123c2f40f0dee18dbfa19a3c292c12a.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/36/0x8c0d9959d123c2f40f0dee18dbfa19a3c292c12a.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
